title: n1betscam
author: n1betscam
content: Hi,I have account on www.n1bet.com I make 4 deposit - 2400e, i make 30 bets and win. I have on account 7100e. They hold my money over 10 days, my account is fully verify, they want video call, they confirmed me skype call, but nobody call me. I send them all documents for full verification. I have all proofs from chat and from mail. They stole my win and my profit. They ignore me by mail, support is very bad, always same answer. Skip this bookies, if you woudnt lose money. I report this case to Curacao egaming, GoodLuckMate, Interpol and oddsportal.com.Have you any more suggestion for help?Some proofs here:https://ibb.co/YLLsyMvhttps://ibb.co/kDbXrh4

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: They have a bad reputation from the reviews on trustpilot and I also see your complaints thereyou should make your post in this section https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0and complete all necessary evidence such as:Scammers Profile Link: Reference Links:Amount Scammed: Payment Method: Proof of Payment: PM/Chat Logs:Additional NotesUnfortunately, they don't have an ANN Thread here so you won't get a response from them on this forum

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: n1betscam on October 21, 2022, 11:14:44 PMHi,I have account on www.n1bet.com I make 4 deposit - 2400e, i make 30 bets and win. I have on account 7100e. They hold my money over 10 days, my account is fully verify, they want video call, they confirmed me skype call, but nobody call me. I send them all documents for full verification. I have all proofs from chat and from mail. They stole my win and my profit. They ignore me by mail, support is very bad, always same answer. Skip this bookies, if you woudnt lose money. I report this case to Curacao egaming, GoodLuckMate, Interpol and oddsportal.com.Have you any more suggestion for help?Some proofs here:https://ibb.co/YLLsyMvhttps://ibb.co/kDbXrh4-  I'm sorry for your experience with the gambling platform you played on, mate, I hope you can recover and that the n1bet team will still contact you, although from what I see, the chances of you recovering your money on that platform are about 50/50. And besides that, I didn't see that n1bet has a thread section here in this forum, so I said it's a bit vague that the management of n1bet will respond.But still do the right thing, and hopefully, you will recover and get your rights as a gambler, after you have evidence based on your statements here.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Like what said above, follow the details and send this to scam section or reputation to have more better views and to provide Flagging .though This casino is not that active advertising here , yet it would be an eye opener for potential victim from this forum.Sad to see you losing that big money mate, sorry .

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: n1betscam on October 21, 2022, 11:14:44 PMSome proofs here:https://ibb.co/YLLsyMvhttps://ibb.co/kDbXrh4if seen from all the evidence above it is quite clear that their site is problematic and should make a report thread to Scam Accusations , but I don't see gambling sites have ANN in this forum, but this report is important for users of this forum not to visit that gambling site and I see their site is still operating well, hopefully you don't break their rules too so they keep your money there

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: Always look for users reviews of any gambling network before registering on the platform, this platform already has a bad reputation among its users, your mistake is you failed to ask questions or do research first, sorry for your loss.

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: There are so many bad reviews about their site, I guess you should look at people's experiences before trying to play there. But, the experience you share is also very useful for people. Regarding the review of this site, you can see it on the site that I put below.https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.n1bet.com

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Unfortunately you learned it the hard way by losing money on those scammers.This should serve as a life lesson that every time you want to gamble or join a certain casino it is a great idea to read this very section for reviews on different casinos.You can immediately spot the good ones here by checking their ANN thread which is full of good reviews and feedback and usually a lot of activity is going on in these casinos.You would soon know that there are quite some of them that are trustworthy and offer you a huge amount of games and of course instant withdrawals in most of the cases.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: This is very bad of casino company for not faithful to its customers. This n1bet.com, 1xbit/1xbet are brother and  the worse part of it upon all these allegation level against them people are still going there to gamble.  It's like there are some complains that are coming from will be unanswered again. Because people knowing full well that these casinos owners are there to scam people. Yet people are still gambling there. I don't really understand the whole thing. By the way you if there is any ANN thread in the forum lay your complain there and also PM the manager.Quote from: Strongkored on October 22, 2022, 02:59:13 AMThey have a bad reputation from the reviews on trustpilot and I also see your complaints thereyou should make your post in this section https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0and complete all necessary evidence such as:Scammers Profile Link: Reference Links:Amount Scammed: Payment Method: Proof of Payment: PM/Chat Logs:Additional NotesUnfortunately, they don't have an ANN Thread here so you won't get a response from them on this forumStrongkored said there is no ANN thread so you have to follow the steps he told you to do.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: You won’t get any help or closure by posting this here in the forum. First of all you just created your account here right after you got scam and the casino in question doesn’t use Bitcointalk forum which means user here are not aware about the existence of this scam casino until you brought it up here. This help will newbie that will search google about the casino but the forum itself doesn’t benefit on this so there’s no need to file a formal scam accusation because that is only for casino that has an official ANN thread here.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Sad to hear about your loss. But it taught lessons to many. I mean it’s always advised to never play with real money on new or unpopular casinos. But you still played there OP, and that also by depositing huge amount of money. Now nothing can be done to be honest.The site you mentioned in the OP doesn’t have any ANN thread here also.Nevertheless you should be careful next time onwards while choosing a gambling site.

comments.author: ThemePen
comments.body: Always choose the right place where you want to gamble. There are many trusted casinos. Which are giving better opportunities to gamble and have a quik withdraw option too. By the way thanks for giving information about this scam. There are many scammers in the market. We should avoid and be careful from them. And should choose the better platform for this purpose.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: n1betscam on October 21, 2022, 11:14:44 PMHi,I have account on www.n1bet.com I make 4 deposit - 2400e, i make 30 bets and win. I have on account 7100e. They hold my money over 10 days, my account is fully verify, they want video call, they confirmed me skype call, but nobody call me. I send them all documents for full verification. I have all proofs from chat and from mail. They stole my win and my profit. They ignore me by mail, support is very bad, always same answer. Skip this bookies, if you woudnt lose money. I report this case to Curacao egaming, GoodLuckMate, Interpol and oddsportal.com.Have you any more suggestion for help?Some proofs here:https://ibb.co/YLLsyMvhttps://ibb.co/kDbXrh4I mostly appreciate the fact that you reported the issue here, thanks to you, at least you would save many people from falling into that trap of the same website. I hope you can still recover your money back, but it is gross to have trust in a company only for them to stab you in the back. Next time, try to go for the right companies that could guarantee your withdrawals, you can do a lot of personal reviews online if you don't know people to turn to for this, BTT will also guide you at the gambling board. You should stop falling for their big incentive and bonuses, they only use them to lure their victims.

comments.author: n1betscam
comments.body: Thank you very much on support. All good suggestion I will accepted. I want that all members learn on my mistake, and never open account on n1bet.comProblem is they take my deposit, any bookmaker cant stole deposit. I never heard this. Maybe Curacao egaming and Interpol help me.If you have more suggestion where I can put my proofs and bad reviews pleae write here Do you know where they have official account where they can answer me.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: n1betscam on October 21, 2022, 11:14:44 PMHi,I have account on www.n1bet.com I make 4 deposit - 2400e, i make 30 bets and win. I have on account 7100e. They hold my money over 10 days, my account is fully verify, they want video call, they confirmed me skype call, but nobody call me. I send them all documents for full verification. I have all proofs from chat and from mail. They stole my win and my profit. They ignore me by mail, support is very bad, always same answer. Skip this bookies, if you woudnt lose money. I report this case to Curacao egaming, GoodLuckMate, Interpol and oddsportal.com.Have you any more suggestion for help?Some proofs here:https://ibb.co/YLLsyMvhttps://ibb.co/kDbXrh4I read your case and had to spend a few minutes thinking before making my post, Before creating an account at a casino, a person needs to do research and when you do research, focus on whether or not the casino has any accusations of scam, then you have to investigate who owns the casino and whether or not they sponsor anything important and how long they have been operating. Now see your case, you lost money, so far this is something normal in this market that has many scammers, but the biggest problem is that you KYC in a scam casino, if these shits are able to not pay you of course these scammers will sell your documents, because those damn thieves like moneyQuote from: n1betscam on October 22, 2022, 08:56:02 AMThank you very much on support. All good suggestion I will accepted. I want that all members learn on my mistake, and never open account on n1bet.comProblem is they take my deposit, any bookmaker cant stole deposit. I never heard this. Maybe Curacao egaming and Interpol help me.If you have more suggestion where I can put my proofs and bad reviews pleae write here Do you know where they have official account where they can answer me.you did well to report them to interpool and curacao, but you have to try to get in touch with more people who were robbed by these scammers for them to also report their problem to interpool and curacao, because the more people are reporting the more they will call attention of interpool and curacao and they will take some action, also report your case to their domain provider, i believe their domain provider will not want to do business with scammers and also report to neteller and skrill, it seems to me that they have an account on neteller and skrill

comments.author: spyrosc200
comments.body: Contrary to what other wrote, i believe that you will get paid at the end.N1bet is operated by Dama N.VThere are 68(!) Dama N.V casinos listed at askgamblers.There are dozens of complaints but at the end they pay everyone.If i was you, i would post my complaint here:https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/n1bet-casinoThey have a representative there so they will respond you.Don't mention sportsbetting as askgablers deals only with casino complaints. Wrote that N1bet is stalling your withdrawal etc.GL, hope you get paid mate.

comments.author: n1betscam

Dama N.V casinos listed at askgamblers.There are dozens of complaints but at the end they pay everyone.If i was you, i would post my complaint here:https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/n1bet-casinoThey have a representative there so they will respond you.Don't mention sportsbetting as askgablers deals only with casino complaints. Wrote that N1bet is stalling your withdrawal etc.GL, hope you get paid mate.Thank you, I made complaints to askgamblers.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: n1betscam on October 22, 2022, 08:56:02 AMIf you have more suggestion where I can put my proofs and bad reviews pleae write here Do you know where they have official account where they can answer me.I'm sorry to hear about your experience. I understand how frustrating it can be when a casino doesn't pay out your winnings. Unfortunately, N1Bet Casino is not advertised on this forum and has no official representative to handle support issues. As a result, we are unable to assist you in this matter. The only thing you can do here is open a topic in the Scam Accusations board to warn other members about this casino site. (Now I see you've already done that.)But there is some good news here: I was able to find information about the casino on the AskGamblers website, and I noticed that they have an active representative there who is willing to resolve complaints. I suggest you open a case with AskGamblers and explain your situation to them so that they can mediate between you and the casino operator.https://www.askgamblers.com/online-casinos/reviews/n1bet-casinoHopefully, you will be able to come to some sort of agreement, and this will help you get your money back. Good luck!EDIT:Quote from: n1betscam on October 22, 2022, 09:39:31 AMThank you, I made complaints to askgamblers.I didn't see your post when I was writing my reply. I hope you will be successful with your claim.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Indeed, judging by the reviews about n1bet, they have a really bad reputation if OP had rested the reviews that were on trustpilot long before he started playing on the platform, it could have saved him from losing, now only hope for a successful outcome in the lawsuit.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Looking at the narration of the money you have sent to them that is a lot of money. It is a pity about this scam that you are experiencing. It is a lesson that we all have to learn not being quick to play. When we focus on the winning we don't look at other details. If you went for the review of the site you can see others complaining meaning the site don't have trust. You can hope for success to the withdrawal and you open a thread to advise and warn others on scam accusation.
